title.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol.II. Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N.Broadway, Chicago. 1923 Entertainment given by Russian Red Cross for aid to starving in Russia.

div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol.II. Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N.Broadway, Chicago. Entertainment given by Russian Red Cross for aid to starving in Russia.

body.p: The Russian Red Cross gave an entertainment on January 20, 1923 at Hull House. L.Kopelevich-Luganov, of the Moscow and Kharkov State Theaters, spoke on "The Position and Role of the Contemporary Theatre in Soviet Russia".
The Dramatic Society "Rampa" gave the play "Zhenitba Balzaminova".
